title: 如果mc加了材质包一直闪退怎么办
author: Buryer

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: LZ的显卡不支持材质包，建议你直接删除材质包。

replies.author: tzxwdu
replies.txt_content: 什么叫如果？楼主请到问答板块，并且说清楚

replies.author: Buryer
replies.txt_content:

就是出了问题
